data.title: GB RAIL ROVER GUIDE
data.meta_description: How to find rail rover and railway ranger tickets on the national rail network. Rover tickets are cheap tickets for rail travel
data.text:
Welcome to the GB Rail Rover Guide

If you're looking for a rail rover or ranger ticket you'll find them all here.

The GB Rail Rover Guide covers the whole of England, Scotland and Wales so whether you're looking for a multi-day rover ticket or just a day ranger you'll find all the information you need here.

For each rover/ranger there's descriptions, prices and general information as well as easy to read route-maps.

Find tickets by either browsing the "Ranger Finder" below or use the search box opposite to see which rover and ranger tickets are valid at each station.

SENIOR RAILCARD

⅓ off rail fares

for anyone aged 60 and over

1 year railcard £30

3 year railcard £70

Purchase railcard Renew railcard

NETWORK RAILCARD

⅓ off rail fares around London and

the South East for you and your friends

1 year railcard £30

Purchase railcard Renew railcard

16-25 RAILCARD

⅓ off rail fares

for anyone aged between 16 and 25

1 year railcard £30

3 year railcard £70

Purchase railcard Renew railcard

FAMILY & FRIENDS RAILCARD

⅓ off rail fares plus 60% off kids' fares

1 year railcard £30

3 year railcard £70

Purchase railcard Renew railcard
